title: PM grieved over martyrdom of army officers in Kohlu
content:
The prime minister prayed for the elevation of ranks of the martyrs in Jannah and condoled with the bereaved families.He said the security forces were protecting the country from the nefarious designs of the terrorists, adding terrorists could not sabotage our efforts for peace.He said the nation saluted those who embraced martyrdom in the fight against terrorism.
